trans-unit.source: Resources, roles and access control in Application Insights
trans-unit.target: Resources, roles and access control in Application Insights

trans-unit.source: Owners, contributors and readers of your organization's insights.
trans-unit.target: Owners, contributors and readers of your organization's insights.

trans-unit.source: You can control who has read and update access to your data in Visual Studio <linkText>Application Insights[start]</linkText><title></title>, by using <linkText>Role-based access control in Microsoft Azure</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: You can control who has read and update access to your data in Visual Studio <linkText>Application Insights[start]</linkText><title></title>, by using <linkText>Role-based access control in Microsoft Azure</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Assign access to users in the resource group or subscription to which your application resource belongs - not in the resource itself.
trans-unit.target: Assign access to users in the resource group or subscription to which your application resource belongs - not in the resource itself.

trans-unit.source: Assign the Application Insights component contributor role.
trans-unit.target: Assign the Application Insights component contributor role.

trans-unit.source: This ensures uniform control of access to web tests and alerts along with your application resource.
trans-unit.target: This ensures uniform control of access to web tests and alerts along with your application resource.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Learn more</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Learn more</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: First, some definitions:
trans-unit.target: First, some definitions:

trans-unit.source: Resource - An instance of a Microsoft Azure service.
trans-unit.target: Resource - An instance of a Microsoft Azure service.

trans-unit.source: Your Application Insights resource collects, analyzes and displays the telemetry data sent from your application.
trans-unit.target: Your Application Insights resource collects, analyzes and displays the telemetry data sent from your application.

trans-unit.source: Other types of Azure resources include web apps, databases, and VMs.
trans-unit.target: Other types of Azure resources include web apps, databases, and VMs.

trans-unit.source: To see all your resources, go to the <linkText>Azure Portal[portal]</linkText><title></title>, sign in, and click Browse.
trans-unit.target: To see all your resources, go to the <linkText>Azure Portal[portal]</linkText><title></title>, sign in, and click Browse.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Choose Browse, then either Everything or Filter by Application Insights</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Choose Browse, then either Everything or Filter by Application Insights</linkText>

trans-unit.source: <linkText>**Resource group**[group]</linkText><title></title> - Every resource belongs to one group.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>**Resource group**[group]</linkText><title></title> - Every resource belongs to one group.

trans-unit.source: A group is a convenient way to manage related resources, particularly for access control.
trans-unit.target: A group is a convenient way to manage related resources, particularly for access control.

trans-unit.source: For example, into one resource group you could put a Web App, an Application Insights resource to monitor the app, and a Storage resource to keep exported data.
trans-unit.target: For example, into one resource group you could put a Web App, an Application Insights resource to monitor the app, and a Storage resource to keep exported data.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Choose Browse, Resource groups, then choose a group</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Choose Browse, Resource groups, then choose a group</linkText>

trans-unit.source: [Subscription](https://manage.windowsazure.com) - To use Application Insights or other Azure resources, you sign in to an Azure subscription.
trans-unit.target: [Subscription](https://manage.windowsazure.com) - To use Application Insights or other Azure resources, you sign in to an Azure subscription.

trans-unit.source: Every resource group belongs to one Azure subscription, where you choose your price package and, if it's an organization subscription, choose the members and their access permissions.
trans-unit.target: Every resource group belongs to one Azure subscription, where you choose your price package and, if it's an organization subscription, choose the members and their access permissions.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>**Microsoft account**[account]</linkText><title></title> - The username and password that you use to sign in to Microsoft Azure subscriptions, XBox Live, Outlook.com, and other Microsoft services.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>**Microsoft account**[account]</linkText><title></title> - The username and password that you use to sign in to Microsoft Azure subscriptions, XBox Live, Outlook.com, and other Microsoft services.

trans-unit.source: It's important to understand that in addition to the resource you created for your application, there are also separate hidden resources for alerts and web tests.
trans-unit.target: It's important to understand that in addition to the resource you created for your application, there are also separate hidden resources for alerts and web tests.

trans-unit.source: They are attached to the same <linkText>resource group</linkText><title></title> as your application.
trans-unit.target: They are attached to the same <linkText>resource group</linkText><title></title> as your application.

trans-unit.source: You might also have put other Azure services in there, such as websites or storage.
trans-unit.target: You might also have put other Azure services in there, such as websites or storage.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Resources in Application Insights</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Resources in Application Insights</linkText>

trans-unit.source: To control access to these resources it's therefore recommended to:
trans-unit.target: To control access to these resources it's therefore recommended to:

trans-unit.source: Control access at the resource group or subscription level.
trans-unit.target: Control access at the resource group or subscription level.

trans-unit.source: Assign the Application Insights Component contributor role to users.
trans-unit.target: Assign the Application Insights Component contributor role to users.

trans-unit.source: This allows them to edit web tests, alerts, and Application Insights resources, without providing access to any other services in the group.
trans-unit.target: This allows them to edit web tests, alerts, and Application Insights resources, without providing access to any other services in the group.

trans-unit.source: You must have Owner rights to the subscription or the resource group.
trans-unit.target: You must have Owner rights to the subscription or the resource group.

trans-unit.source: The user must have a <linkText>Microsoft Account[account]</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: The user must have a <linkText>Microsoft Account[account]</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: You can provide access to individuals, and also to user groups defined in Azure Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: You can provide access to individuals, and also to user groups defined in Azure Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Add the user there.
trans-unit.target: Add the user there.

trans-unit.source: ![In your application's resource blade, open Essentials, open the resource group, and there select Settings/Users.
trans-unit.target: ![In your application's resource blade, open Essentials, open the resource group, and there select Settings/Users.

trans-unit.source: Click Add.](./media/app-insights-resources-roles-access-control/01-add-user.png)
trans-unit.target: Click Add.](./media/app-insights-resources-roles-access-control/01-add-user.png)

trans-unit.source: Or you could go up another level and add the user to the Subscription.
trans-unit.target: Or you could go up another level and add the user to the Subscription.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Select a role for the new user</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Select a role for the new user</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Role
trans-unit.target: Role

trans-unit.source: In the resource group
trans-unit.target: In the resource group

trans-unit.source: Owner
trans-unit.target: Owner

trans-unit.source: Can change anything, including user access
trans-unit.target: Can change anything, including user access

trans-unit.source: Contributor
trans-unit.target: Contributor

trans-unit.source: Can edit anything, including all resources
trans-unit.target: Can edit anything, including all resources

trans-unit.source: Application Insights Component contributor
trans-unit.target: Application Insights Component contributor

trans-unit.source: Can edit Application Insights resources, web tests and alerts
trans-unit.target: Can edit Application Insights resources, web tests and alerts

trans-unit.source: Reader
trans-unit.target: Reader

trans-unit.source: Can view but not change anything
trans-unit.target: Can view but not change anything

trans-unit.source: 'Editing' includes creating, deleting and updating:
trans-unit.target: 'Editing' includes creating, deleting and updating:

trans-unit.source: Resources
trans-unit.target: Resources

trans-unit.source: Web tests
trans-unit.target: Web tests

trans-unit.source: Alerts
trans-unit.target: Alerts

trans-unit.source: Continuous export
trans-unit.target: Continuous export

trans-unit.source: ![Type the email address of a new user.
trans-unit.target: ![Type the email address of a new user.

trans-unit.source: Select the user](./media/app-insights-resources-roles-access-control/04-user.png)
trans-unit.target: Select the user](./media/app-insights-resources-roles-access-control/04-user.png)

trans-unit.source: If the user you want isn't in the directory, you can invite anyone with a Microsoft account.
trans-unit.target: If the user you want isn't in the directory, you can invite anyone with a Microsoft account.

trans-unit.source: (If they use services like Outlook.com, OneDrive, Windows Phone, or XBox Live, they have a Microsoft account.)
trans-unit.target: (If they use services like Outlook.com, OneDrive, Windows Phone, or XBox Live, they have a Microsoft account.)

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Role based access control in Azure</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Role based access control in Azure</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.target: https://account.microsoft.com
